Report on RStudio Ian Davis 2018-11-16 1 Letter of Transmittal| Ian Davis aloosefish 262 Northern Ave Boston, MA 02210 Julie Kares, PhD Portland State University 1825 SW Broadway Portland, OR 97201 Dear Dr. Kares, This report is a profile of the company RStudio. It focuses on how RStudio affected the evolution of data analytics by its creation and support of tools that modernize the R programming language and statistical computing environment. RStudio also produces materials that teach these tools, including blogs, interactive tutorials, and books. The report will summarize RStudio’s contributions to… I hope this report meets your expectations Respectfully, Ian Davis
